translation.en: [sighs] [man 1] Third break down this month.
-[woman 1] Let's just walk back… -[woman 2] Hi, sorry, Min.
translation.zh:
‎-我们还是走回去吧…
‎-嗨 抱歉 敏

translation.en: Not the best way to spend your birthday.
It's fine.
I'd rather be home watching my dramas anyway.
Hey, shouldn't we go with the crowd?
translation.zh: ‎嘿 我们不该跟着大家走吗？

translation.en: Look, there's someone up ahead.
[Alexandra] Manila, she'll welcome you with smiles as warm as the sun.
translation.zh:
‎马尼拉
‎它会用像阳光一样温暖的笑容欢迎你

translation.en: When the sun sets, take a turn down a dark alley…
translation.zh: ‎太阳下山后 在阴暗的小巷中转个弯

translation.en: and you might find yourself as prey.
translation.zh: ‎你可能会发现自己成了猎物

translation.en: Kidnappers and thieves are the least of your worries.
translation.zh: ‎现在绝不是你担心绑匪和小偷的时候

translation.en: Beware the ones that crave your blood and covet your soul.
translation.zh:
‎小心那些渴望你血液
‎觊觎你灵魂的人

translation.en: They can't be bound by handcuffs.
My father used to say, "Leave the shadows be.
Light will be there to maintain the balance."
Night has taken this city.
The shadows have grown darker.
The treaty that has kept the humans safe
translation.zh: ‎保护人类不受冥界鬼怪伤害的

translation.en: from the supernatural Underworld has begun to unravel.
Good people keep trying to fight back, but the dark forces are getting stronger.
translation.zh: ‎好人不断抗争 ‎但黑暗势力越来越强大

translation.en: There is no light to keep the shadows in check.
translation.zh: ‎如今 光无法控制住阴影

translation.en: There is only me.
Good evening, Captain Guerrero.
Hello, Alexandra. Thanks for coming down.
translation.zh: ‎你好 亚历桑德拉 谢谢你过来

translation.en: I had a feeling you might want to see this.
translation.zh: ‎我感觉你可能会对这情况感兴趣

translation.en: I admit, I was curious when you described the circumstances.
translation.zh:
‎我承认
‎你描述的情况勾起了我的好奇

translation.en: So, is it…
[Alexandra] The White Lady of Balete Drive.
Any witnesses, Lt. Tapia?
translation.zh: ‎塔皮亚中尉 有目击证人吗？

translation.en: [Tapia] No, ma'am.
But one of the neighbors positively ID'd the victim as "Gina Santos."
translation.zh: ‎但有邻居确认死者身份为吉娜桑托斯

translation.en: [Tapia] We checked it, and it turns out she committed suicide in…
translation.zh:
‎我们调查后发现她是自杀的
‎自杀的时间是…

translation.en: -[paper rustles] -"…1995."
Wait, that can't be right.
Ancient runes crudely done. -[Alexandra] Clearly ritual sacrifice. -[scrapes]
translation.zh:
‎古文字 写得很粗糙
‎很明显是仪式祭祀

translation.en: The bigger question is, who would want to kill a ghost and why?
translation.zh:
‎更重要的是 谁会想要杀一个鬼魂？
‎以及为什么？

translation.en: [Miranda] Death is nothing to be afraid of, Alexandra.
translation.zh: ‎死亡没什么好怕的 亚历桑德拉

translation.en: It is not an end, but a rebirth to another plane of existence.
translation.zh:
‎这不是结束
‎而是通往另一个层界的重生

translation.en: There was a time when magic in the world was a natural part of life.
translation.zh:
‎曾几何时
‎魔法是世间日常生活的一部分

translation.en: That age has passed.
People fear what they don't understand.
translation.zh: ‎人们害怕自己不了解的东西

translation.en: That's why our family has always been the bridge between mankind
translation.zh:
‎所以我们家一直都是
‎就是人类和超自然事物之间的

translation.en: and the supernatural.
Your father might be the lakan and protector of the accords,
translation.zh: ‎虽说你父亲是拉坎 是协议的守护者

translation.en: but I know a few things.
translation.zh: ‎但有些事我也是略知一二的

translation.en: -When a soul gets lost… -[gentle music]
…we, babaylan, have the power to help.
[Guerrero] Tapia, get SOCO to gather the evidence before it blows away.
translation.zh:
‎塔皮亚 让犯罪现场特工来收集证据
‎免得风把证据吹走

translation.en: -[plastic crinkles] -[Tapia] Yes, Cap!
What?
You just reminded me of your father for a moment.
Anton was usually the only one with a clue in a case like this.
translation.zh: ‎这种案件中 通常只有安东有头绪

translation.en: But now that he's gone…
well, now we have you, Alexandra.
translation.zh: ‎现在我们有你在 亚历桑德拉

translation.en: There are a few places to acquire magic this strong.
translation.zh: ‎能获得这么强大的魔法的地方有几个

translation.en: But I know where to start looking.
I have friends in low places.
[in English] I need to see your master. I have some questions for him.
translation.zh: ‎我要见你师父 我有事想问他

translation.en: Down, boy. She's on the level.
translation.zh: ‎坐下 孩子 她说的是真的

translation.en: Greetings, young Trese.
Good evening, Nuno.
I can always count on you for the dirt.
translation.zh: ‎要打听丑闻 来找你总是对的

translation.en: Nuno sees nothing and hears nothing.
translation.zh:
‎土丘老怪什么也没看到
‎什么也没听到

translation.en: -[Nuno] I just… -[paper rips]
What do you know about the White Lady?
Okay, okay.
Last week, she was crowing about how her lover
translation.zh: ‎上周 她还在吹嘘自己的情人

translation.en: was going to make her a queen
if she helped close a deal with an aswang clan.
translation.zh: ‎只要她能帮他和阿斯旺部族达成协议

translation.en: [Nuno] Then I hear whispers in the tunnels that somebody put a hit out on her.
translation.zh:
‎接着我听见地道里有人在嘀咕
‎有人下令要杀了她

translation.en: Aswang?
What did they want with her?
[Nuno] If you want a seat at their table, the buy-in is a sacrifice.
translation.zh: ‎如果你想在他们的桌上有一席之地 ‎那获得的方式就是出祭品

translation.en: That dizzy dame thought she was going to be a player.
translation.zh: ‎那蠢女人还以为自己会成为玩家

translation.en: But she ended up as the chips.
I need to find out which clan made the pact, and then with whom.
translation.zh:
‎我得查清楚是哪个帮派在订立契约
‎以及他们订立契约的对象

translation.en: Oh, you'll know the crew from the poison they used.
translation.zh:
‎你从他们用的毒液
‎就能弄清楚他们是谁了

translation.en: For a bite of that, I could tell you what it is.
translation.zh:
‎你只要让我吃一口这个
‎我就可以告诉你是怎么回事

translation.en: -[Alexandra] Well? -[exclaims]
Ground mermaid bones.
Surefire way to trap a ghost in the earthly plane and kill it.
translation.zh:
‎这绝对是诱引鬼魂来到人间
‎再将其杀死的好法子

translation.en: [Nuno] The aswang pack that controls the pier are the only ones who have it.
translation.zh:
‎只有控制码头的阿斯旺那帮人
‎才有这东西

translation.en: But you didn't hear that from me. [chuckles] Nobody likes a snitch.
translation.zh:
‎不过这话你可不是从我这听来的
‎没人喜欢打小报告的人

translation.en: A pleasure doing business with you, as always.
-[phone beeps] -Boys, time to go hunting.
[aswang 1] Hey! No humans allowed.
Your kind is not welcome here.
-[objects clatter] -[aswang 2] Hey!
The only way you can get in-- [groans, thuds]
Greetings, Ibwa, Chief of the Sapa Clan.
translation.zh: ‎你好 伊布瓦 萨福帮首领

translation.en: I am Alexandra Trese.
The aswang clan signed the accords with my father,
translation.zh: ‎阿斯旺帮派和我父亲签过协议

translation.en: and you are bound by those rules to cooperate with my investigation
translation.zh: ‎你要遵守规定 配合我的调查

translation.en: or face the consequences.
[in Filipino] This son of a bitch.
[in English] You come to my turf, and threaten me?
Only I make the rules around here, bitch.
translation.zh: ‎这里只有我说了算 贱人

translation.en: -End her! -[growls]
[Alexandra] Tell them to go away
or I swear you'll have taken your last breath.
translation.zh: ‎不然我发誓 你会没命的

translation.en: Do what she says.
-[aswang 3] We'll be right outside. -[aswang 4] Yes, Chief.
Who did you give the mermaid bones to?
[Ibwa] Screw you.
The accords dictate that I should give you a warning
for obstructing an investigation.
No. [groaning]
Consider yourself warned.
Is that an aswang eye?
That's pretty badass.
I need the water in the glass, please.
Thirsty, bossing?
I want to see what kind of creature of darkness we're dealing with here.
translation.zh:
‎我想看看我们要对付的
‎是什么样的黑暗生物

translation.en: that fire monster again, Mama?
translation.zh: ‎妈妈 你又在召唤那个火怪吗？

translation.en: [Miranda] His face can be a little scary, but he is not a monster.
translation.zh: ‎他长得是有点可怕 但他不是怪物

translation.en: He is the Great Spirit of the Binondo Fire,
and we must show him respect.
Remember what your papa and I always tell you.
translation.zh:
‎记得我和爸爸
‎平时是怎么跟你说的吗？

translation.en: -You need to-- -You need to see beyond the outside.
[light snicker] Correct.
All of us must see beyond to live in balance.
translation.zh:
‎我们所有人都要透过现象看本质
‎这样我们才能活在平衡当中

translation.en: Give me your hand.
[phone beeps] Anton, how was the council meeting?
[exhales] [Miranda] I knew they would side with you.
translation.zh: ‎我就知道他们会站在你这边的

translation.en: Now stay in the city. We're fine.
translation.zh: ‎你就留在城里 我们没事

translation.en: -We'll see you later… -[line static]
Hello?
My love, it's time to play that game I taught you, okay?
translation.zh: ‎亲爱的 该玩我教你的游戏了 好吗？

translation.en: [Miranda] Remember where Papa and I showed you how to hide?
translation.zh:
‎记得我和爸爸
‎是怎么教你躲起来的吗？

translation.en: I want you to go there and don't come out until I call.
translation.zh:
‎我要你现在就去那
‎在我叫你之前都别出来

translation.en: Okay, Mama.
[in English] Stay as quiet as you can and keep Sinag close.
[Miranda] Whatever happens, remember to see beyond the outside.
translation.zh:
‎不管发生什么事
‎都记得要透过现象看本质

translation.en: I love you, my darling.
So very much.
Now, go.
Hello, Captain Guerrero.
[Mayor Santamaria] Crimes like these cannot wait for due process.
translation.zh: ‎这种犯罪不能照正当程序来

translation.en: I promise to find and punish the guilty myself.
translation.zh:
‎我向大家保证
‎一定会亲手抓住凶手并严惩不贷

translation.en: -This is why the people elected me. -No rest for the wicked, Captain.
translation.zh:
‎-这就是百姓选我的原因
‎-恶人无休止啊 上尉

translation.en: Tell me about it.
We may need you on this one, too.
Doesn't help that I got a circus trampling on my crime scene.
translation.zh:
‎请个马戏团来践踏我的犯罪现场
‎简直是帮倒忙

translation.en: …and why they will do so again!
translation.zh:
‎…这也是为什么
‎他们还会这么做的原因

translation.en: [all] Yeah!
Mayor Santamaria's office got wind of it.
translation.zh:
‎桑塔玛利亚市长办公室的人
‎知道了这事

translation.en: And now, he wants to take over.
God, I love election time.
He might be trying to cover something up rather than solve it.
translation.zh:
‎与其说是要破案
‎不如说他可能是想掩盖什么

translation.en: [Guerrero] Mayor Santamaria isn't someone you can go up against, Alexandra.
translation.zh:
‎桑塔玛利亚市长不是你能对付得了的
‎亚历桑德拉

translation.en: He's got backers rich enough to keep him in office
translation.zh: ‎他的靠山有足够多的钱让他继续执政

translation.en: and powerful enough to make his critics disappear.
translation.zh: ‎他们的权力也足以让批评他的人消失

translation.en: Gina Santos, the White Lady of Balete Drive,
translation.zh: ‎吉娜桑托斯 巴莱特路上的白衣女士

translation.en: was his mistress when she killed herself.
He sacrificed her ghost to gain favor with the aswang.
translation.zh: ‎他牺牲她的灵魂 用来取悦阿斯旺

translation.en: If he's aligning with them, I need to know why.
translation.zh:
‎如果他在跟他们合作
‎我需要知道原因

translation.en: [PR] Vote for Mayor Santamaria. Reelect a man who cares for the people.
translation.zh:
‎给桑塔玛利亚市长投票
‎让关心人民的人再次当选

translation.en: [Basilio] Hoy!
Do I know you?
We have a mutual acquaintance.
Ibwa tells me you took some mermaid bones from him.
translation.zh:
‎伊布瓦跟我说
‎你从他那儿拿走了一些人鱼骨头

translation.en: He runs a bad crew, Mr. Mayor.
translation.zh: ‎这人管的是一群恶人 市长先生

translation.en: You're better off coming clean for the murder of Gina Santos
translation.zh:
‎和他们打交道的下场
‎比承认自己杀死吉娜桑托斯的下场

translation.en: than dealing with them.
What a wild imagination you have for such a pretty face.
translation.zh: ‎长得这么漂亮 想象力也很丰富啊

translation.en: But if you're going to accuse me of something that serious,
you'd better have proof.
I have important work to do for my constituents.
translation.zh: ‎我要为选民忙活重要的事情

translation.en: I don't have time for fairy tales of aswang and mermaids.
translation.zh:
‎我可没时间
‎听什么阿斯旺、人鱼的童话

translation.en: I never said anything about aswang, Mr. Mayor.
translation.zh: ‎我可压根就没提过阿斯旺 市长先生

translation.en: Apparently, the train broke down over the Guadalupe Bridge.
translation.zh: ‎火车显然是在瓜达露佩桥上出故障的

translation.en: Service crew found it like this, lots of blood, no bodies,
translation.zh:
‎服务人员发现时就是这样子
‎血液飞溅 但就是没尸体

translation.en: and a pile of missing persons reports.
Do you smell something burning?
[sniffs] No.
There was a fire at the squatters area nearby.
translation.zh: ‎附近的非法居住区发生了火灾

translation.en: But that was two nights ago.
translation.zh: ‎但这已经是两天前晚上的事了

translation.en: We're still trying to locate those residents.
They seem to have vanished.
I see.
Will you excuse me, Captain?
translation.zh: ‎你能先离开一下吗 上尉？

translation.en: I would like the car to myself, please.
-[line dialing] -[fire roars]
Good evening, little Trese.
What game shall we play today?
Greetings, Great Santelmo.
translation.zh: ‎你好 伟大的圣艾尔摩之火

translation.en: I'm afraid this is business,
and I need your help to uncover what happened.
Well, you're no fun.
The souls who were killed in this car are here,
translation.zh: ‎在这车里遇害的灵魂还在这里

translation.en: yet, they are not, and they are not alone.
I sense spirits on fire.
[Santelmo] People who had burned to death in their sleep.
They, too, are making the journey.
How can the souls be here and yet not be here?
translation.zh:
‎灵魂要如何做到
‎身在此处 又不在此处？

translation.en: We are standing in two trains right now.
[Santelmo] One for the living…
And the other for the dead.
Thank you, Santelmo. May the great light shone upon you.
translation.zh:
‎谢谢你 圣艾尔摩之火
‎愿圣光照耀着你

translation.en: [in English] Ibu, Goddess of Death, sends her greetings to you…
[in Filipino] …Lakan of humanity.
[in English] Emissary, since when does Ibu use the MRT
translation.zh: ‎特使 伊布何时开始使用地铁

translation.en: to ferry the souls of the dead?
The train follows the original pathways.
[Emissary] The most efficient way to the Afterworld.
It wasn't in the original agreement with your father,
translation.zh: ‎这和你父亲原本签的协议不一样

translation.en: but she formally asks that you,
as the current lakan and enforcer of the accords,
translation.zh: ‎身为协议执行者的现任拉坎

translation.en: consider her request to use it.
translation.zh: ‎能够考虑她的请求 让她使用地铁

translation.en: I will allow it, but in return, I need a favor.
translation.zh:
‎我会同意 但作为回报
‎我需要你帮个忙

translation.en: Tell me where those three girls died and how.
translation.zh:
‎告诉我这三个女孩死在哪里
‎她们是如何死的

translation.en: They were hunted down by a clan of aswang on these tracks.
translation.zh:
‎她们是在轨道上
‎被阿斯旺帮派的人追杀的

translation.en: Taken to the tribe's lair, where they met their demise
translation.zh:
‎她们被带到阿斯旺部族的藏身处后
‎就遇害了

translation.en: and their souls found their way back to Ibu's train.
translation.zh:
‎随后她们的灵魂自己
‎回到伊布的列车上

translation.en: They were not the only ones.
Show me where they were killed.
-As you wish. -[flapping]
-[tires screech] -[engine shuts off]
-[Alexandra] Wait for my signal. -[car door opens, closes]
[Crispin] You got it, bossing. We'll be ready when you need us.
translation.zh: ‎没问题 老大 我们随时待命

translation.en: Please help me.
They took my daughter.
Mark the soul as ours before it flies away.
translation.zh:
‎趁灵魂还没有飞走
‎赶紧打上我们的标记

translation.en: Or Xa-Mul will kill us.
The souls are worth more than the meat.
[aswang 5] Hold still, you brat!
It's all right. You're safe now.
[Xa-mul] Trese!
I know you're in there with our food.
translation.zh: ‎我知道我们的食物和你在里面

translation.en: I could smell your stench from a mile away.
translation.zh: ‎我从大老远就闻到你的臭味了

translation.en: Stay close.
[Xa-mul] Don't be rude.
Come out and join the party.
[aswang 6] Trese!
It's not a party when your guests are here against their will, Xa-Mul.
translation.zh:
‎客人来得不情不愿
‎这算哪门子的派对 萨穆尔？

translation.en: -The accords-- -Don't apply here.
Not after what you did to Ibwa. [scoffs]
Those humans were a payment and ours to do with as we please.
translation.zh:
‎那些人类是我们的报酬
‎我们可以任意处置

translation.en: Take the girl!
If the lakan gets in the way…
kill her.
Kill her.
[Xa-mul] Walk away, Trese.
And maybe I'll let this offense slide.
translation.zh: ‎没准这次我就不跟你计较了

translation.en: [Basilio] It was Kuya Crispin, who disobeyed your order to wait.
translation.zh:
‎是库亚克里斯平违抗命令
‎不想再等下去

translation.en: [Crispin] Couldn't let you have all the fun this time, bossing.
translation.zh: ‎这次不能让你独享乐趣了 老大

translation.en: It's okay.
[Crispin] Oh, and we freed the people in the back.
translation.zh: ‎对了 我们把后面的人放了

translation.en: Cover me.
[in Filipino] Mother! My baby.
[in English] Thank you. You saved my baby.
Can you tell us what happened?
translation.zh: ‎能告诉我们发生了什么事吗？

translation.en: A group of us had survived the fire in Guadalupe but lost everything.
translation.zh:
‎我们一群人从瓜达露佩大火中
‎幸存下来 但我们失去了一切

translation.en: [mother] Mayor Santamaria's men came and offered to pay for our relocation.
translation.zh:
‎桑塔玛利亚市长的人过来
‎说要出钱 重新安置我们

translation.en: They had been trying to get us to move even before the fire.
translation.zh:
‎在失火之前
‎他们就一直在催我们搬家

translation.en: [man 2] We all knew he was making a deal to build condos,
translation.zh:
‎我们大家都知道他和人谈好了
‎要盖公寓

translation.en: so we wanted to hold out for a better price.
translation.zh:
‎所以我们想继续捱下去
‎以讨个好价钱

translation.en: But now,
-there was no choice. -[metal gate closes]
At first, it was good.
[man 3] We had a clean place to stay and they fed us.
translation.zh:
‎我们有干净的地方住
‎他们还提供食物

translation.en: The mayor himself came and promised that he would take care of everything.
translation.zh:
‎市长亲自过来向我们保证
‎他会处理好一切

translation.en: Then, night fell.
-[scribbles] -The aswang.
-[man 4] They came for us while we slept. -[screams]
translation.zh: ‎他们趁我们睡觉时跑来攻击我们

translation.en: They dragged us away and kept us in cages. And we weren't the only ones.
translation.zh:
‎他们把我们拖走 关在监牢里
‎被关的还不只是我们

translation.en: Every day, they brought groups of people.
translation.zh: ‎他们每天都会带一大群人过来

translation.en: Like us, they were taken in the dark of night
translation.zh:
‎他们跟我们一样
‎也是在黑夜里被抓走的

translation.en: where nobody would miss us.
From broken down trains to squatters area set on fire,
translation.zh:
‎从出故障的火车一直到非法居住区
‎全都起火了

translation.en: all of us powerless to do anything but wait.
translation.zh: ‎我们除了等待 什么也做不了

translation.en: We could hear the feasting and screams through the walls.
translation.zh:
‎你可以听到大快朵颐和尖叫的声音
‎从墙那头传来

translation.en: I saw the Mayor in the kitchen talking to the aswang.
translation.zh: ‎我看到市长在厨房里和阿斯旺说话

translation.en: [woman 3] Renegotiating their deal.
He promised he would cover up their train raid
translation.zh: ‎他承诺他会替他们掩盖火车突袭事件

translation.en: and burn more settlements for their food supply.
translation.zh: ‎烧毁更多居民点为他们供应食物

translation.en: We called out to him for help, but he ignored us.
translation.zh: ‎我们向他求救 可他却不理我们

translation.en: Once he got what he wanted, we were nothing to him.
translation.zh:
‎一旦他得到了他想要的东西
‎我们对他来说就什么也不是

translation.en: Ah, we may not be able
translation.zh: ‎我们或许没法因为桑塔玛利亚市长

translation.en: to arrest Mayor Santamaria for making deals with the aswang,
translation.zh: ‎我们或许没法因为桑塔玛利亚市长 ‎和阿斯旺做交易一事而逮捕他

translation.en: but we got him on human trafficking, arson,
translation.zh: ‎但我们可以以贩卖人口、纵火

translation.en: and the murder of his mistress, Gina Santos.
translation.zh: ‎谋杀情妇吉娜桑托斯的罪名逮捕他

translation.en: You okay?
There are monsters among us, and some of them human.
translation.zh:
‎有怪物置身于我们当中
‎其中有些是人类

translation.en: I should have gotten there sooner to save the others.
translation.zh: ‎我应该早点到那里 去救其他人的

translation.en: But look at all the people you saved.
[Anton] Alexandra?
Alexandra.
It's all right, little one. You're safe with Papa.
translation.zh:
‎没事的 小家伙
‎你和爸爸在一起很安全

translation.en: Those aswang scum will pay for this.
translation.zh: ‎那些阿斯旺败类必须为这事付出代价

translation.en: Mama.
Rough night, huh, bossing?
No more than usual, Hank.
Mayor Sancho Santamaria was arrested this morning
translation.zh: ‎桑塔玛利亚市长今天上午 ‎（本画面由ABCZNN新闻台提供）

translation.en: on several dozen counts of murder and corruption
translation.zh:
‎因涉嫌在瓜达露佩齐起火案中 ‎犯下数十起谋杀罪以及贪污罪
‎而被逮捕

translation.en: connected with the fire at Guadalupe.
translation.zh:
‎犯下数十起谋杀罪以及贪污罪
‎而被逮捕

translation.en: [reporter] According to our sources,
there is also new evidence linking the Mayor
translation.zh: ‎有新证据表明市长还和他所谓的情妇

translation.en: to the death of his alleged mistress, Gina Santos.
What was reported as a suicide is now believed to be a murder.
translation.zh:
‎这起原本被定性为自杀的案件
‎现在被认为是谋杀

translation.en: What is it?
I bring a peace offering from Ibu for your arsenal.
translation.zh:
‎我带来了伊布的致歉礼物
‎能充当你的武器

translation.en: She hopes the lakan has forgiven her mistake.
translation.zh: ‎她希望拉坎能原谅她的过错

translation.en: The Goddess of Death hardly needs to worry about offending anyone.
When the sixth child of the sixth child
takes her rightful place as ruler of the Underworld,
as was foretold by the prophecy,
the Court of Death would like to be in her good graces.
translation.zh: ‎死神法庭希望得到她的青睐

translation.en: That's not me.
But you may tell Ibu that we are good.
translation.zh:
‎不过你可以跟伊布说
‎我们之间相安无事

translation.en: For now.
Yes. Captain? I'm here.
♪ When I feel you next to me ♪
